title: RBI warns of 'yellow fever' outbreak
description: The RBI warns of supervisory action if banks do not rectify irregularities in gold loan practices within three months. The gold loan sector has seen rapid growth, necessitating enhanced controls and transparency, particularly concerning third-party involvement and potential misuse in valuation and loan disbursement.
